perturbation.original_text:
C.
As part of Maintenance Services, Supplier shall provide the following:


(1)
help desk support available twenty-four (24) hours a day, seven (7) days a week via toll-free telephone number with help desk
technicians sufficiently trained and experienced to identify or resolve most support issues and who shall respond to all Bank of
America requests for support within fifteen (15) minutes after receiving a request for assistanceÍ¾
perturbation.changed_text:
C.
As part of Maintenance Services, Supplier shall provide the following:


(1)
help desk support during normal business hours via telephone number with help desk technicians sufficiently trained and experienced to identify or resolve most support issues. The help desk technicians shall respond to all Bank of America requests for support.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the '24 hours a day, seven days a week' availability, and the 'fifteen (15) minutes' response time, the modified text creates an internal contradiction with the definition of Maintenance Period found in Section 1.26, which defines it as 'twenty-four (24) hours per day, seven (7) per week, including Bank of America holidays.' Now the contract references a defined Maintenance Period, but a specific service is described in a way that may not align with that definition. A different section still references the 24/7 helpdesk support (SCHEDULE D - Maintenance Services), but Section C, (1) is not specific.
